thread.title: Greek Deputy Minister Resigns Over Outcry on Social-Media Posts
thread.title_full: Greek Deputy Minister Resigns Over Outcry on Social-Media Posts - WSJ

author: Nektaria Stamouli
title: Greek Deputy Minister Resigns Over Outcry on Social-Media Posts
text:
ATHENS—Greece’s newly elected government ran into its first pothole on Wednesday, as its deputy transport minister was forced to resign over outcry about social-media posts he allegedly wrote.
In one of the shortest terms in a Greek cabinet in recent years, Dimitris Kammenos, who is member of the junior coalition party Independent Greeks, resigned pending an investigation into a series of anti-Semitic and homophobic tweets posted... To Read the Full Story, Subscribe or Sign In
